alert.note: Alert for Banks; Barrow; Clarke; Jackson; Madison (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 4:39PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Barrow, southeastern Banks, northern Clarke, Jackson and Madison Counties through 515 PM EST... At 438 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Homer to near Jefferson to near Russell, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Commerce, Homer, Danielsville, Statham, Maysville, Arcade, Nicholson, Comer, Bethlehem, Colbert, Ila, Hull, Athens-Clarke County, Westgate Park, Diamond Hill, Oconee Heights, Barretts Mill, Banks Crossing and James Holland Youth Sports Cmpx. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for north central and northeastern Georgia.
